version_description:
Some very final tweaks before the release.

Localizations updated.
Updated the icons, now they look cooler.

We're happy to ship the first update after the release.

As many of you have pointed out, Previous and Next buttons are better next to each other. We've put them this way â€” just like left-right arrows.

If the Save button wasn't working for you, this is most likely because you didn't give access to Photos. Artpaper needs it to save artworks to Camera Roll, from where you can set them as wallpapers. We added an additional permission prompt if you declined it in the first place.

Another bug fixed: when you opened a notification it would reload the artwork from the notification and override with a new one. A nasty one.

A few layout issues on iPhone X were fixed, too.

We respect your privacy. We wrote a user-friendly privacy policy in plain English, without complex juristic terms: https://twopeoplesoftware.com/artpaper/privacy

Send us feedback at contact@twopeoplesoftware.zendesk.com with 'Artpaper' in subject. Follow us on Twitter, Instagram, Weibo: @ArtpaperHD

We squashed an annoying layout bug on iPhone 8 and smaller, which was distracting you from looking at beautiful artworks. 
Now you can fully enjoy the experience.

We were working on App Store Optimization in the US. Unfortunately, it can't be done without an app update.

Anyway, since we've got your attention already, you can follow us on Insta and Twitter: @ArtpaperHD
We post a lot of gorgeousness daily!

Yours,
Artpaper team
